items.title: Akero Therapeutics: Where This Potential MASH Play Stands Currently
items.description: Discover the latest on Akero Therapeutics, Inc., a biotech firm focusing on metabolic balance therapies, with a market cap of $2 billion. Click for my AKRO update.
